reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We spent just over a week at the Quest Glen Waverley and although our stay wasn't without incident we will be return guests and have no hesitation in recommending the property.
reviews.title: Comfortable and convienient ...

reviews.text: We contacted the hotel directly and were offered a good rate for a 1 bedroom apartment, our original room was smaller than I had expected but still comfortable and well appointed. We had a maintenance issue which was quickly addressed, however, due to a plumbing issue (when we used the bathroom the apartment below us got flooded) we were moved to another room.a couple of days into our stay. The room we ended up in was much bigger and better layed out and also faced the rear of the property which was a relief as the previous room faced Springvale Road and traffic noise did keep me awake and wake me through the night. this may not bother you if you are used to it but we are from a really quiet town.
reviews.title: Wonderful

reviews.text: We were in Melbourne attending a wedding so the location was convienient for us in terms of the wedding venues and also close to family and friends. There are a number of restaurants nearby and also a large shopping centre. We took advantage of the room service option the hotel has set-up with a few local restaurants with free delivery, the food was good and the service was fast!!
reviews.title: Attractive apartment option

reviews.text: Carparking is an additional $10 per night and access to the carpark is a little tricky to get to - access via a few back streets off the main road etc. I am not sure about the hotels proximity to public transport as we didn't need to use any.
reviews.title: Beautiful new apartments

reviews.text: Overall a great place to stay!
reviews.title: Well appointed and very clean
